thread.title: James Harden Has His ‘What Are Those??’ Moment
thread.title_full: James Harden Has His ‘What Are Those??’ Moment

author: Juliet Spies-Gans
title: James Harden Has His ‘What Are Those??’ Moment
text:
James Harden Has His ‘What Are Those??’ Moment No, they're not K-Swiss' new line. Juliet Spies-Gans Editorial Fellow, HuffPost Sports Posted: 10/02/2015 10:43 AM EDT | Edited: 13 minutes ago 
It’s been a month of strange headlines for James Harden. While the public has already recently questioned his ability to adequately endorse products and adequately handle his alcohol , Harden left us with the biggest question yet on Thursday night. 
For the love of all that is holy, WHAT ARE THOSE ??? A closer look at the new #addidas James Harden shoes #Rockets #abc13sports pic.twitter.com/wHQCMN60Ze — David Nuño (@DavidNunoABC13) October 1, 2015 
Harden’s shoes are Crest toothpaste-level white, bulky and kind of resemble a bolster pillow cushion . And while the arrival of a literal truckload of shoes at Harden’s house caused jealousy throughout the Twitterverse yesterday, the newly revealed design of the sneakers has shifted the Internet trolls’ jealousy to joy. 
Joy that they do not have to put on or promote the Pillsbury doughboys that are currently encasing Harden’s feet. It's only a matter of time before he gets the same " What are those? " ﻿treatment that his Airness Michael Jordan recently received. @Cody_Stoots @DavidNunoABC13 Those are terrible. Off to play shuffleboard at the home... — Enrique Banda (JR) (@jbanda03) October 1, 2015 Most James harden shoes he got from adidas are what are those — Alex Lopez (@ItsAlex_MF) October 1, 2015 James Harden not playing in an NBA game in those "What Are Those". Nah — Vernie Mack (@VernieMack) October 1, 2015 I can see why even after a $200 million contract Harden rocked Nike until the very last day! #WhatAreThose ! https://t.co/FE1SnLWPBO
